title: FFRF Attorneys Explain Why Repealing the Johnson Amendment Would Be a Disaster
text:
« Ask Richard: Older Atheists Have Difficulties with Their Religious Families, Too (Part 2 of 2) About Hemant Mehta 
Hemant Mehta is the editor of Friendly Atheist, appears on the Atheist Voice channel on YouTube, and co-hosts the uniquely-named Friendly Atheist Podcast . You can read much more about him here .
